poem:
Title: "Volatile Mirage"

Trump's victory looms, an uncertain spectre,
Over the trembling earth. Our precious sphere,
In jeopardy. Frail balance at the precipice.
Its elemental breath used as collateral,
For power's hollow crown.
Chances, slim as gossamer wings,
Ravaged by brash rejection of truth.
His indifference, a monument of ice,
Melting irrevocably into our shared future
In the face of the world's second deadliest sin.
